comments:

It doesn't make sense which debugger used (ZendDebugger or XDebug).

I'm look at sources. It seems like PDT have recursion while building composite include path including referenced project. So, the problem that I have cyclical dependencies between projects (I know it's bad smell :) ). With normalized dependencies debugger works fine.

Can you plese send us a description of your project's structure or a 
'sanitized' zip that recrates the issue
